sentence.text: The most important finding is the recurrently mutated gene, animal organ morphogenesis, which has never been reported in parathyroid tumors before.

Moreover, we identified two different somatic mutations in the negative regulation of cell proliferation gene and one somatic mutation in the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The Y54X mutation in the negative regulation of cell proliferation gene was previously identified in parathyroid carcinomas, which proved that parathyroid adenomas and carcinomas might possess similar molecular signatures.
